item.title: When I Use Valtio and When I Use Jotai
item.description: Introduction Recently, I often got asked about this question: Which is recommended, valtio or jotai? For those who are not familiar with them, they are two out of many state management libraries that I developed. https://github.com/pmndrs/valtio https://github.com/pmndrs/jotai Now, from the library perspective, their implementations are very different. However, from the usage perspective, I understand the confusion. Both serve similar functionalities and we don’t usually use both in a single app.

item.title: Learning React State Manager Jotai With 7GUIS Tasks
item.description: Introduction I stumbled upon 7GUIS tasks while reading XState Tutorials. This motivated me to challenge those 7 tasks with jotai. It turned out that this would be a good resource to learn jotai. They are from basic tasks to advanced tasked, and you will see how they are implemented, occasionally magically. It’s recommended to try it yourself first. If you succeed to implement it, then you can compare. Even if you fail, you can read and learn.
